channel.title: Off topic
channel.description: Talk about whatever you want in here.

item.title: help creating melee weapon
item.author: invalid@example.com (chathura)
item.dc:creator: chathura
item.content:encoded:
can u help me to create a sword.. i am so stuck.. i am new to UDK. want to learn UnrealScript.. please help.. i want to extend the UTWeapon Class and create the sword.. if u can show an example it will be great..(the source code i have doesnt have good explanations with them. i even in internet i can find meanings of some classes and functions..)

thanks

item.title: Happy Birthday Parser!
item.author: invalid@example.com (DeathAdder)
item.dc:creator: DeathAdder
item.content:encoded: I hope you have a good one. What's up with Fraghouse these days?

item.title: LightBringer Status
item.author: invalid@example.com (DeathAdder)
item.dc:creator: DeathAdder
item.content:encoded:
Hey FH team and friends, how's it goin?!?

I'm riding the economic woeful storm atm, but hanging in there. I gotta new rig going blazing away with vista 64 atm.

I've shelfed my thoughts on any mapping and server hobbies for now. T-100 wanted to revive it. So, you never know, the server may come back.

I hope all is well.


Gears of War 2 team had a big celebration here yesterday at Epic. I hope it is a success for them.

Hope to hear from ya. l8rz

item.title: What things gives you nightmares?
item.author: invalid@example.com (Moofis)
item.dc:creator: Moofis
item.content:encoded: Well aside from everything else in my pethetic life I just watched the movie "Donnie Dargo" and theres a demon rabbit in it which scared the living tissue out of me. What scares the hell out of you?

item.title: I live again!
item.author: invalid@example.com (SKShadow4D)
item.dc:creator: SKShadow4D
item.content:encoded:
Have I been dead? NEVER! NEVER, I SAY!


*Ahem* Yeah, still don't have UT2k4 back yet, but now there is yet more hope...


*points at 189 GB Hard Drive*


Edit: *looks at last visited time* No one remembers me, I wager... Seeing as I have not been around for about a year... Yeah...

item.title: Whats your favorite weapon from any game?
item.author: invalid@example.com (8mm_BuLLEt)
item.dc:creator: 8mm_BuLLEt
item.content:encoded: You know weapons... those big things that fire stuff at high rates of fire... and sometimes nail headshots... that all very well, but whats your most favorite game from any game in the entire FPS world? Mines the machine gun which Q1-11 seems to wield and the Shark gun from LucasArt's Armed & Dangerousâ„¢. Whats yours?

item.title: Hey FHI Team
item.author: invalid@example.com (DeathAdder)
item.dc:creator: DeathAdder
item.content:encoded:
This is LightBringer just stopping by to say and thanks again for mods especially the FHI which I use on my servers. Also, wanted to hear from you on your latest projects beyond what you post on your news sections. Me, I'm continuing to make maps that are tailored for my server setup which means they are FHI, but more of the spam easy kill type with little effort in making the map clean, neat, and award-winning lol. I guess my maps are clean as in boxy with low amount of polys and acute...

Hey FHI Team

item.title: What other games does everyone play?
item.author: invalid@example.com (lvlorpheus)
item.dc:creator: lvlorpheus
item.content:encoded:
Apart from UT what other games do people play?

I mainly play HL-Natural Selection, AoE3, Dungeon Seige 2, Civ 4 and sometimes Guild Wars.

item.title: for ppl who hate campers :)
item.author: invalid@example.com (icemanex)
item.dc:creator: icemanex
item.content:encoded:
i was browsing some ut2004 sites for mutators and i come across something interesting called "campers hunter"
it claims to spawn a bot with a matrix style agent skin with a sniper rifle that hunts down campers by teleporting to their location anywhere on the map and killing them or trying to unless they die first
i think every server should install this
additionally have someone code a similar thing that spawns a spacefighter or raptor to kill vehicles that camp or stay still for too...

for ppl who hate campers

item.title: FH Community Events?
item.author: invalid@example.com (Daedalus)
item.dc:creator: Daedalus
item.content:encoded: I just had this idea to maybe hold Fraghouse sponsored community events for our mods. Just to kind of get some support and such and just to have some fun with fans. Anyone up for this?

item.title: Panic!
item.author: invalid@example.com (lvlorpheus)
item.dc:creator: lvlorpheus
item.content:encoded:
Saturday : 18:37. Panic! Internet goes down

Theres me thinking there was a glitch with Pipex so I wait until Sunday. Still doesn't work. Failed phone call to Pipex on Sunday (They don't work Sundays! bah ).

Monday : 13:30. Phone call to Pipex.

Connection is working, nothing wrong with the signal etc etc. Possibly router is broken!

Tuesday : 14:39. New router.

New router installed and working! = Empty Wallet!

feedback ppl please

item.title: HELLO INTERNET
item.author: invalid@example.com (lvlorpheus)
item.dc:creator: lvlorpheus
item.content:encoded:
Woah its been a while!

Hope everyone is well and had a good summer/holidays!

Not really done much mapping since I was around a few months ago, but have just started warming up the ol' UED now

item.title: Explanation to why I will stop being productive
item.author: invalid@example.com (Kaithofis)
item.dc:creator: Kaithofis
item.content:encoded:
Allrighty then, the summer holidays began! I have passed my exams and expected to have 2 months with loads of time to pick up modding again (something that I haven't done in almost a month)

Unfortunately, do to my promotion at work a couple of months back, I am 1 of the 3 people responsible for a certain... department, if you will.
And, with the other 2 being abroad on holiday, I will have to make sure everything runs smoothly all by myself, meaning I will have to work as often as...

Explanation to why I will stop being productive
